ing.item: Canned apricot halves; in heavy syrup;
Frozen for at least twelve hours

directions.step:
Place the can of apricots in hot water for about 1 minute. Remove the lid and pour any liquid into a food processor. Remove the bottom of the can, slide the fruit out, and chop into 1-inch pieces.
Place in the food processor with the amaretto and process until smooth, about 1 minute.
Serve at once or transfer to a container and place in the freezer. Posted to Digest eat-lf.v096.n128
